Deprecated List

Member CjrlDynamicRobot::computeJacobianCenterOfMass ()=0
Migration instructions:
Let my_robot be an instance of class CjrlDynamicRobot and output_matrix a matrix container of size 3 x my_robot.numberDof().

Replace:

my_robot.computeJacobianCenterOfMass();
output_matrix = my_robot.jacobianCenterOfMass();
by:

my_robot.getJacobianCenterOfMass(my_robot.rootJoint(), output_matrix);

Member CjrlDynamicRobot::jacobianCenterOfMass () const =0
Migration instructions:
Let my_robot be an instance of class CjrlDynamicRobot and output_matrix a matrix container of size 3 x my_robot.numberDof().

Replace:

my_robot.computeJacobianCenterOfMass();
output_matrix = my_robot.jacobianCenterOfMass();
by:

my_robot.getJacobianCenterOfMass(my_robot.rootJoint(), output_matrix);

Member CjrlFoot::JRLDEPRECATED (virtual void getProjectionCenterLocalFrameInSole(vector3d &outCoordinates) const)=0
Should be always 0

Should be always 0.
